name: XRReferenceSpaceEvent
description: The WebXR Device API interface XRReferenceSpaceEvent represents an event sent to an XRReferenceSpace. Currently, the only eventÂ  that uses this type is the reset event.
content:
Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

The WebXR Device API interface XRReferenceSpaceEvent represents an event sent to an XRReferenceSpace. Currently, the only event that uses this type is the reset event.
